me.Abhigya.core.util.packet

Class PacketChannelHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Abhigya.core.util.packet.PacketChannelHandler

  • public final class PacketChannelHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple player's channels handler, for handling the receiving-sending packets.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  PacketChannelHandler.PlayerChannelHandler
      The duplex channel handler for handling the packets when receiving or sending.
      private static class  PacketChannelHandler.PlayerInjector
      Listener that injects any player that joins the server.
      private static class  PacketChannelHandler.PlayerInjectorReflection
      Reflection class used by the PacketChannelHandler.PlayerInjector for getting the channel of a Player.
      private static class  PacketChannelHandler.RegisteredPacketListener
      Class representing the registered version of a PacketListener.

    • Method Detail

      • addPacketListener

        public static void addPacketListener(java.lang.String packet_name,
                                     PacketListener.Priority priority,
                                     PacketListener listener)
        Registers the provided PacketListener that will be run when a packet is being sending or receiving ( packets which its name is the same as the provided ).

        Parameters:
        packet_name - Name of the packets this listener will manage.
        priority - Priority of the listener.
        listener - Listener to run.

      • removePacketListener

        public static void removePacketListener(PacketListener listener)
        Unregisters the provided PacketListener.

        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to unregister.
